description: The reciprocal agreement will last for the duration of the air bridge between the two islands.
title: Isle of Man and Guernsey reach temporary health agreement
title_page: Isle of Man and Guernsey reach temporary health agreement - BBC News
maintext: Heidi Soulsby, president of Guernsey's Committee for Health and Social Care, said travellers should continue to "secure their own travel insurance" wherever possible, but acknowledged this was "not an option for everyone".
